title: I Researched Amazon KDP Niches for You (My Honest Findings)

tactics.name: keyword editioning
tactics.description: create targeted editions of popular keywords to reduce competition
steps: append demographic modifiers like 'teen edition' to keywords
caveats: may not work for highly saturated keywords
source_quotes: I would use the words stop self-sabotage mom edition or dad edition

tactics.name: keyword variation
tactics.description: Create new titles by altering 1-2 words in existing popular titles
steps: Modify keywords like '10 days to self-esteem' to '10 minutes a day self-esteem journey'
caveats: High competition in core self-esteem niches
source_quotes: You can easily change one word, one or two words, but it can have the same keywords

tactics.name: audiobook synergy
tactics.description: Leverage existing print book niches by creating complementary audiobooks
caveats: Requires content creation for audio format
source_quotes: If you can write a book, create the Kindle version, the paperback version, and then launch it as an audio book

tactics.name: Add Twist to Niche
tactics.description: Modify existing niches with specific angles to create unique demand.
source_quotes: You have to add a twist... empowered stay-at-home wife

tactics.name: Workbook Bundling
tactics.description: Pair main content with complementary workbooks for expanded offerings.
source_quotes: Workbooks are amazing... include that in your book

tactics.name: Niche Angle Refinement
tactics.description: Identify undersaturated sub-niches by combining broad keywords with specific contexts (e.g., 'self leadership' + 'church').
steps: Use keyword tools to find related terms
Filter results by BSR and review count thresholds
Add contextual modifiers like 'in the church' or 'with a narcissist'
caveats: High competition may require unique value propositions
source_quotes: Self leadership for women in the church... competition you can easily rank on the first page.

heuristics.name: low competition boost
heuristics.condition: If keyword has fewer than 200 reviews and BSR over 50,000, prioritize
source_quotes: Self-esteem workbook 14 boys... competition is healthy

heuristics.name: Low Competition Signal
heuristics.condition: If niche has <500 competitors and >100 reviews, prioritize
source_quotes: Competition is healthy... want low competition

heuristics.name: Low-Competition Boost
heuristics.condition: If niche has fewer than 200 reviews, prioritize it for lower competition
source_quotes: Co-parenting after divorcing a narcissist... 97 competitors.

claims.statement: self-esteem workbooks for teens show healthy competition and high revenue potential
source_quotes: Self-esteem workbook 14 boys... potential for revenue looks very good

claims.statement: Audiobooks in the perfectionism niche can generate $96,000 monthly revenue
source_quotes: The revenue looks insane. $96,000 is the estimated revenue for the month

claims.statement: Audio books require voice talent but are viable KDP products
source_quotes: Audio book... pay someone to do the voice

claims.statement: Seasonal trends like New Year resolutions drive self-development demand
source_quotes: People are seeking to be better... January and February

claims.statement: Co-parenting niches show 3,000+ competitors but 97 specific sub-niches
source_quotes: Co-parenting as a whole has uh 3,000 competitors.

claims.statement: Audiobooks in co-parenting niche generate $11k monthly revenue

niche_patterns.description: target underserved demographics with specific problems
niche_patterns.why_it_works: creates niche demand with low content saturation
source_quotes: I see an opportunity... for teen boys

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific audience identities with problems and constraints for niche opportunities
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates targeted content with lower competition and higher monetization potential
source_quotes: Think in terms of target audiences. Think in terms of who is going to be your audience
